items.question: What is this?
items.answer: This is a knowledge map. It helps people who have knowledge or skills and those who are looking for them to find each other.

items.question: How does it work if I have knowledge or skills?
items.answer: If you are working on a project, you can use the knowledge map to keep a diary about it and describe the project with tags, for example. Other users can then search by tags or descriptions, get inspired, or contact you to ask for advice.

items.question: How does it work if I am looking for help?
items.answer: Use the search function to find a project similar to yours. Then you can either see how others have done it so far or contact them to ask for advice.

items.question: Can I help with development?
items.answer: Yes, you can help with development. You can find the source code on GitHub at [https://github.com/ZAM-haus/wissenslandkarte](https://github.com/ZAM-haus/wissenslandkarte) and contribute to it. If you have any ideas for improvements, please let us know.
